casebody.data:
Veronica FOLDI, wife of and George Foldi, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. ARGONAUT INSURANCE COMPANY, Defendant-Appellee. No. 31021

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. April 1, 1971. Rehearing Denied April 22, 1971. Ronald Tanet, of Silvers & Tanet, New Orleans, La., for appellants. Henry B. Alsobrook, Jr., of Adams & Reese, New Orleans, La., for appellee.

Before THORNBERRY, MORGAN and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir.; see Isbell Enterprises v. Citizens Casualty Co. of N.Y., 431 F.2d 409, Part I (5th Cir. 1970).

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Fifth Circuit Rule 21.1 Also see Hyler v. Reynolds Metal Co., 434 F.2d 1064 (5th Cir. 1970).

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 430 F.2d 966 (5th Cir. 1970).
